title: Flos Carmeli (Flower of Carmel)
lyrics: Flower of Carmel, tall vine blossom laden ; Splender of Heaven, child-bearing yet maiden, None equals thee . (x2) Mother so tender who no man didst know ; On Carmel's children, thy favors bestow, Star of the sea . (x2) Strong stem of Jesse, who bore one bright flower ; Be ever near us and guard us each hour, who serve there here . (x2) Purest of lilies that flowers among thorns, Bring help to the pure heart that in weekness turns, and trusts in thee . (x2) Strongest of armor, we trust in thy might : Under thy mantle, hard-pressed in the fight, we call to thee . (x2) Our way uncertain, surrounded by foes, Unfailing counsel thou givest to those who turn to thee . (x2) O gentle Mother, who in Carmel reigns, Share with thy servants that gladness you gained and now enjoy . (x2) Hail, Gate of Heaven with glory now crowned Bring us to safety where thy Son is found, true joy to see . (x2) Amen . Alleluia . Hoa xinh núi Cát Minh ; Dây nho mộng sai trái chín ; Vinh quang chốn thánh cung ; Sinh con nhưng lòng trinh nguyên ; Mẹ trên núi Thánh hiển vinh ; chở che đoàn con . Trinh vương núi Cát Minh ; Nêu gương tình yêu tín thác ; Hay trong những khó nguy ; Kiên trung tâm nguyện xin vâng ; Mẹ thương uốn nắn lòng tin ; Xóa tan hoài nghi .
